name: Unless You Shop You'll Drop
description:
When eight strange characters find themselves in what seems to be an empty supermarket, forced to play strange games (pop culture and otherwise) for their lives(?), how will they react? Who will live? Who will die? 

Perhaps most importantly, why are they there, and should you care about any of them in the end?

You'll have to play this short in-progress parody killing-game game to find out.
